se.cbb.jprime.prm

Interface ProbAttribute

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<ProbAttribute>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ContinuousAttribute, DiscreteAttribute
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanAttribute, DoubleAttribute, IntAttribute

    public interface ProbAttribute
extends java.lang.Comparable<ProbAttribute>
    Represents a fixed attribute of a PRM class, analogous to a column in a relational database table. These hold variant data, typically corresponding to various characteristics.

    The attribute is tied to a PRM class, and also holds all attribute entities (column values) in an indexed list which must be aligned with all other attributes of the PRM class.

    An attribute may be marked as latent (hidden or unknown), although some sort of hard-assignment to entity values is most often employed.

    Two instances of implementors of this interface are considered "comparable" if they share the same full name. This situation should occur seldom in practice.

    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.
